name: Modern Commando Combat Battle
description:
The most advanced and thrilling Modern Commando Combat Battle shooting mission Game is here. Fight with the best armed forces with full of heavy weapons in Strike force. You have to fight with courage and bravery and win the Battlefield. Fight with best weapons and defeat all the assassins.

Modern Commando Combat Battle will fulfill your yearning to impact the opposition! With pivotal movement and Epic battle controls including sliding, jumping, inclining out from cover and that's just the beginning, Battleground takes the Kill shot experience to the challenging level in battleground. 

Modern Commando Combat Battle is an extremely fascinating, exquisite Kill shot Battle game. It has wonderful frames and easy controls. As a commando, you require an incredible bravery to release your companions from battleground in fortnight battle having headshot ability. You can get the gold coins by shooting the assassins, so you can purchase other more Killer weapons.
Kill your all the enemies in this critical strike and make a victory in the battle.Clear the battleground killing the assassins by one shot and get a new mission. Don’t get defeated in this monster strike, defeat your enemies.

Features:

• Realistic 3D Effects
• High Definition Graphics
• Realistic War Scenes
• User Friendly Interface
• Easy Navigation
• Powerful Weapons
• Breath taking Sound Effects
• A lot of challenging Missions in battleground
• Its a free game available on app store.
